title: Last of the Zinja
description: Beautiful young Taniko struggles under oppression as the mistress of the cruel Kublai Khan, and Jebu, a young monk, is transformed into a fierce warrior, in a saga of the ancient Orient during a time of bloodshed and magic. This Kindle book contains both book 1, "Time of the Dragons", and book 2, "Last of the Zinja".
author: Robert Shea
